So always remember to keep that up throughout your whole test and, you know, just show what you know and be confident about that.

samples.question: Do you often read?
samples.transcript: To be honest, I used to read a lot when I was a university student because I had more time and I used to go to many different libraries. But since I am an instructor now and I am studying all the time, I have so many time consuming tasks. So, yep, I can say I do not read much because I do not have the time. Okay.
samples.transcript_original: Um, to be honest, I used to read a lot when I was a university student because I had more time and I used to go to many different libraries. But since I am an instructor now and I'm studying all the time, uh, I have so many time consuming tasks. So, yep, I can say I don't read much because I don't have the time. Okay.

But since I am an instructor now and I am studying all the time, I have so many time consuming tasks. So, yep, I can say I do not read much because I do not have the time.

samples.question: So, do you have any e-books?

samples.question: So what books did you read as a child?
samples.transcript: When I was a child, I had a quite different taste. just like other kids, I used to read storybooks. But, I can say that I used to do it because it took me to a new world. And, I would say that is a good choice for many kids to read different books. Nice one.

samples.question: So, do you think it is important to encourage children to read?
samples.transcript: Absolutely yes, because children should be trained from an early age to read different books by their parents or the teachers at a school because it helps them on one hand, it helps them to improve some of their abilities and on the other hand, they will also have something positive and practical to discuss when they are with their friends. Nice one. Thank you very much. That is the end of your special.

samples.question: How did you come here today?
samples.transcript: Well, I actually took a cab because I do not trust public transport that much because there is too much traffic, you know, with the buses and trains is always a problem too. So, I prefer to get to my destination on time, which is why I took a cab.
